ActCanada Pension Plan
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Pension Plan Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA PENSION PLAN REGULATIONS, in order to restore the adjustments made to Canada Pension Plan retirement pensions taken before and after age 65 to their actuarially fair values.
